casebody.data:
Mary Kathryn Castle STEINWAY v. RITZ THEATRE, Inc., an Oklahoma corporation, et al. No. 3902. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 24, 1950. Neal E. McNeill, Tulsa, Okl., for appellant. Charles B. Cochran, Oklahoma City, Okl., and Gentry Lee, Tulsa, Okl., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed January 24, 1950, without written opinion per stipulation, on authority of case. Steinway v. Majestic Amusement Co., 179 F.2d 681.
